author: bradford
msg: Modified XPathQueryResolver to create a new XPathContext for each document
that is returned from the indexing system.  This will allow queries to work
with Xalan 2.2.Dnn, and also 'slightly' speeds up performance on 2.0.1.

author: bradford
msg: Replaced the jaxp jars with the jar from xml-common.  This should ensure
better consistency between Xindice and other Apache projects.

author: rubys
msg: Allow the src and examples targets to be built from clean cvs checkout

author: bradford
msg: Fixed a type in the SAX feature setting of DOMParser

author: bradford
msg: Added Xalan compatibility fix submitted by Sam Ruby
